channel.title: Inner Workings of OstrichDB :: OstrichDB Documentation

item.title: How OstrichDB Works
item.description: Where to Start? Lets talk about how OstrichDB works on the backend. OstrichDB is simple in its design and implementation. Although the codebase may be a bit complex and intimidating at first, the concepts behind it are simple and easy to understand. OstrichDBs entry point is the main procedure in the main.odin file. This main procedure is handles the initialization of several subsystems and launch checks. Once these are completed, the main procedure will call the run procedure from the engine package.
